thread.title: RealtyTech Inc. Set to Unveil New Products at the California Association of Realtors® Expo
thread.title_full: RealtyTech Inc. Set to Unveil New Products at the 2015 California Association of Realtors® Expo

author: Richard Uzelac
title: RealtyTech Inc. Set to Unveil New Products at the California Association of Realtors® Expo
text:
RealtyTech Inc. announces that they will be unveiling revolutionary new online tools at Booth 801 at the 2015 California Association of Realtors® Expo. The California Association of RealtorsTM Expo is the premier trade show for California's real estate industry. The event will take place Oct. 6-8, 2015 in San Jose, CA. The expo features one-of-a-kind educational, networking, and professional development opportunities designed specifically for California REALTORS®.
“California is our home base, the place we made our mark on the industry and what better place to announce the launch of a truly major new product in six years?” said RealtyTech CEO, Richard Uzelac. “This one is a ground breaker and we look forward to showing it off for the first time. We will also be offering some great packages to celebrate the launch.”
The Expo is free for C.A.R. members. This year's event again offers three days of cutting edge technology and the latest market trends for Real Estate Professionals. Discover your next big idea from more than 30 free seminars that now span over three days and take home real ideas and solutions to help real estate professionals become more profitable.
RealtyTech’s Senior Account Executive, Lance Grove, will be presenting live demonstrations of the full premium RealtyTech product lines. He will cover Responsive Websites, IDX Solutions and Online Marketing Tools.
About RealtyTech Inc.
RealtyTech Inc. is a Thousand Oaks, CA-based Company that gives real estate professionals the tools necessary to stand out and succeed in today’s online marketplace combined with solution minded, live California-based customer service. We have over 15 years of online real estate marketing expertise and have spent over 10 years of that experience offering Agent and Office websites, IDX Home Searches and Internet Marketing. For more information, please call (877) 832-4428 or visit http://www.RealtyTech.com
